<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function tries to modify the immediate value in Hexagon::Addi</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions, so that the immediates could then be moved into a load/store</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction with offset and the add removed completely when we call</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// processAddUses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//               ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the below sequence:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the first occuring Addi, so skip modifying this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrentMI == FirstReachedMI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Modify the Addi instruction only if it could be used to modify a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// future load/store instruction and get removed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This check is needed because, if we modify the current Addi instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we create RAW dependence between the FirstReached Addi and the current</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one, which could result in extra packets. So we only do this change if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we know the current Addi would get removed later</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!usedInLoadStore(CurrentInstSN, NewOffset)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we&#39;ll be extending the live range of Rt in the following example,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// make sure that is safe. another definition of Rt doesn&#39;t exist between &#39;add&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and load/store instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ex: Rx= add(Rt,#10)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     memw(Rx+#0) = Rs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will be replaced with =&gt;  memw(Rt+#10) = Rs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!isSafeToExtLR(AddSN, AddMI, BaseReg, UNodeList))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (allValidCandidates(SN, AddaslUseList) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">        SizeInc += AddaslUseList.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Some other instructions to consider -</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
